Package org.jcatapult.deployment.domain

Class Summary
BaseUserInfo Bean that contains user info for JSCH integration User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
Deploy Bean to model deployment properties defined in the deploy xml configuration file User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
DeploymentInfo Bean that contains the information needed by the deploy.groovy script to deploy the jar resource to the selected domain environemnt User: jhumphrey Date: Mar 25, 2008
Domain Bean models a domain descriptor in the deploy xml configuration file User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
Environment Bean that models the environment descriptor in defined in the deploy xml configuration file User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
Project Bean to represent a project xml file.
SSHOptions data struct to represent ssh options for the SSHExec and SCP JSCH adapters User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
